input.sentences: on my way to my first day at law school .
too many red lights in this town .
here is the building i think .
yes | here we go | now time to find parking .

output.sentences: I went on a walk after leaving school.
The town looked nice in the evening light.
I walked past a tall building with a roof patio.
I returned to the lot where I had parked when it was time to leave.
I enjoyed seeing all the beautiful buildings.
